Class playn.core.Font

Changed from an interface to a class. Changed from abstract to non-abstract.

Added Constructors
Font(String, float) Creates a font as specified with Style.PLAIN..
Font(String, Style, float) Creates a font as specified.
 

Removed Methods
String name() Returns the name of this font.
float size() Returns the point size of this font.
Style style() Returns the style of this font.
 

Added Methods
boolean equals(Object)  
int hashCode()  
String toString()  
 

Changed Methods
Font derive(float) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Derives a font with the same name and style as this one, at the specified size.
 

Added Fields

float size The point size of this font.
